channel.title: Which server files do you recommend?
channel.description:
I don't know if this is the proper forum section so I'm sorry I don't know where else to put it...
Which server would you recommend for a beginner? I know java to a point enough to get by and I wanna know what would be a good server to edit and use... I like being able to edit stuff so I can edit stuff in game and not have to open notepad all the time but ya...
I've read stuff on 508 and I kinda like what can be done with it. I've used DeltaScape, moparscape, cheesescape and I don't really have a favorite because I haven't really gotten into them excessively.
So whats your recommendation?

item.title: Which server files do you recommend?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

i use delta and i like it, but maybe try a czar.

Read full topic
item.source: Which server files do you recommend?
